reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?
reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app does not collect any personal information from users.
reply.reference: We do not collect any personal information from you. URL: https://visionboardapp.github.io/

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app declares the collection of data such as mobile device identifiers, app usage data for analytics, and technical logs for monitoring performance and stability.

content: Technical logs for monitoring performance and stability

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions the types of data collected through the app's usage of Google Firebase Analytics, Crashlytics, and Google Admob.
reply.reference: Our iOS Application uses Google Firebase Analytics that is a subject to respective privacy policy. We work with Crashlytics Inc. (“Crashlytics”), a service which collects data of users of our iOS App. Google Admob is used for showing advertisements in our Application. URL: https://visionboardapp.github.io/

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can opt out of data collection or delete data by stopping the use of the application and uninstalling it from their device. The privacy policy states that users can just stop using the apps and even uninstall them if they wish to stop the collection of information.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the option to stop the collection of data by simply discontinuing the use of the application and removing it from their device.
reply.reference: In case you want to stop our apps collecting any information from you, you can just stop using them and even uninstall them from your device. URL: https://visionboardapp.github.io/

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties such as Google Adwords, Google Admob, Google Adsense, Google Analytics services.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the app may display advertisements managed by various third parties, indicating data sharing with these entities.
reply.reference: Our Application may display advertisements or advertising messages managed by third parties (Google Adwords, Google Admob, Google Adsense and Google Analytics services, and their functions for advertisers). Vision Board does not have access to that information about the User and does not control the content of the advertisements that will be shown to him. Refer to Google Admob Privacy Policy for more information. URL: https://visionboardapp.github.io/
